title: Elvis and The Memphis Mambo Murders
description: When her mama Ruby Nell enters a Memphis mambo contest, Callie Valentine Jones, Elvis, her basset hound who believes he is the King reincarnated, and her cousin Lovie must chaperone Ruby as she shakes, rattles and rolls her way to stardom until a killer waltzes into the picture, taking out the competition--one by one.
author: Peggy Webb
